str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Last, at the last, finally, till the end. A superlative probably from echo; farthest, final.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
Perhaps from chalao through the idea of reducing the strength; difficult, i.e. Dangerous, or furious.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From en and histemi; to place on hand, i.e. impend, be instant.
